Transformation Jutsu.name: Transformation Jutsu
Transformation Jutsu.info: User Transforms, gaining a boost in power.

Asura's Blade of Execution.name: Asura's Blade of Execution
Asura's Blade of Execution.obtainment: Obtained after completing the naruto quest in scroll missions

Mystic Palm.name: Mystic Palm
Mystic Palm.info: User heals based on their missing health

Summon Ninken.name: Summon Ninken
Summon Ninken.description: user summons ninja dogs to stun the opponent
Summon Ninken.info: user summons ninja dogs to stun the opponent for 2 rounds.

Analysis.name: Analysis
Analysis.description: User concentrates, forming a plan gaining chakra!
Analysis.info: User concentrates, forming a plan. Grants x chakra

Fireball Jutsu.name: Fireball Jutsu
Fireball Jutsu.description: Launches a massive fireball at the enemy
Fireball Jutsu.info: Launches a massive fireball at the enemy

Smoke Bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
Smoke Bomb.info: User Throws a smoke bomb, increases dodge.

Shadow Clone Jutsu.name: Shadow Clone Jutsu
Shadow Clone Jutsu.info: User summons their clones for assistance in battle

Sexy Jutsu.name: Sexy Jutsu
Sexy Jutsu.info: Distracts the opponent by transforming into a dazzling lady
Sexy Jutsu.obtainment: obtained from naruto mentor at chuunin rank

Kirin.name: Kirin
Kirin.description: summons a lightning bolt from the sky
Kirin.info: User Summons a lightning bolt from the thunder clouds above, striking the enemy for massive damage.
Kirin.obtainment: obtained from sasuke mentor at chuunin rank

Lightning Blade.name: Lightning Blade
Lightning Blade.description: Gathers chakra into a thunderous blade and strikes
Lightning Blade.obtainment: obtained from kakashi mentor at chuunin rank
Lightning Blade.info: User gathers their chakra into a thunderous blade of lightning and strikes the opponent.

Cherry Blossom Impact.name: Cherry Blossom Impact
Cherry Blossom Impact.obtainment: obtained from sakura mentor at chuunin rank
Cherry Blossom Impact.info: User Attacks the enemy with Cherry Blossoms, trust me bro it's strong.

Water Prison.name: Water Prison
Water Prison.description: Traps the enemy in a sphere of water, slowly drowning them
Water Prison.info: User traps the opponent in a sphere of water drowning them each round for chakra.

Needle Assault.name: Needle Assault
Needle Assault.description: Launches a barrage of senbon needles that causes bleeding
Needle Assault.info: User launches senbon needles at the opponent inflicting bleed and dealing damage.

Silent Assassination.name: Silent Assassination
Silent Assassination.info: User gets into the opponents blind spot and attacks them.

Serpents Wrath.name: Serpents Wrath
Serpents Wrath.info: User unleashes a devastating serpent wrath on the opponent, deals a lot of damage.

Creation Rebirth.name: Creation Rebirth
Creation Rebirth.description: uses powerful healing technique that continuously restores health
Creation Rebirth.obtainment: obtained from tsunade during hokage trials
Creation Rebirth.info: A powerful healing technique that continuously restores health every round for chakra

Water Dragon Jutsu.name: Water Dragon Jutsu
Water Dragon Jutsu.description: Creates a powerful water dragon that strikes the enemy
Water Dragon Jutsu.info: User summons a water dragon which deals massive damage to the opponent.
Water Dragon Jutsu.obtainment: obtained from tobirama during hokage trials

Rasengan.name: Rasengan
Rasengan.description: Gathers chakra in his palm and attacks the enemy
Rasengan.info: User uses Naruto's trademark move why are you still checking this description?
Rasengan.obtainment: obtained from naruto at jounin rank

Flying Raijin Jutsu.name: Flying Raijin Jutsu
Flying Raijin Jutsu.description: dodges all incoming attacks and strikes the enemy
Flying Raijin Jutsu.info: User dodges all incoming attacks and attacks the enemy.
Flying Raijin Jutsu.obtainment: obtained from minato during hokage trials

Great Forest Crumbling.name: Great Forest Crumbling
Great Forest Crumbling.description: summons a barrage of wooden branches that crushes the enemy
Great Forest Crumbling.info: User summons a barrage of dead trees that crush the enemy and stun them.
Great Forest Crumbling.obtainment: obtained from hashirama during hokage trials

Rasenshuriken.name: Rasenshuriken
Rasenshuriken.obtainment: obtained from naruto during hokage trials
Rasenshuriken.description: Gathers a massive amount of Spiralling wind chakra into the form of a shuriken then strikes the enemy
Rasenshuriken.info: User Gathers a massive amount of Spiralling wind chakra into the form of a shuriken then strikes the enemy and also applies bleed.

Infused Chakra Blade.name: Infused Chakra Blade
Infused Chakra Blade.description: Strikes with chakra-infused blades, causing bleeding and greatly increasing power.
Infused Chakra Blade.info: User Strikes with chakra-infused blades, causing bleeding and greatly increasing power.

Infused Chakra Blade: Enhanced.name: Infused Chakra Blade: Enhanced
Infused Chakra Blade: Enhanced.obtainment: obtained from asuma at chuunin mentor rank
Infused Chakra Blade: Enhanced.description: Enhanced version of the jutsu Infused Chakra Blade
Infused Chakra Blade: Enhanced.info: user Strikes with chakra-infused blades, causing more bleeding and greatly increasing power.

Burning Ash.name: Burning Ash
Burning Ash.description: Burns the opponent, causing damage over time.
Burning Ash.info: User spews ash over the battlefield which Burns the opponent, causing damage over time.

Lightning Blade: All Out.name: Lightning Blade: All Out
Lightning Blade: All Out.description: performs the lightning blade jutsu but this time, with rage. Lightning engulfs the battlefield sending shocks through the ground and air and also deals damage
Lightning Blade: All Out.info: An Enhanced Version of the jutsu Lightning Blade
Lightning Blade: All Out.obtainment: from kakashi at jounin mentor rank

Shadow Strangle.name: Shadow Strangle
Shadow Strangle.description: user uses shadow to strangle the opponent, dealing damage and immobilizing them.
Shadow Strangle.info: User uses their shadow to strangle the opponent, dealing damage and stunning them.
Shadow Strangle.obtainment: from shikamaru at jounin mentor rank

Singularity Pulse: Requiem of the Stars.name: Singularity Pulse: Requiem of the Stars
Singularity Pulse: Requiem of the Stars.description: user raises their hand, forming a sphere of radiant silver light that bends gravity and time itself. With a calm gesture, the orb erupts into a blinding pulse of cosmic energy, collapsing everything in its path into pure stillness
Singularity Pulse: Requiem of the Stars.info: An advanced version of Singularity Pulse that deals massive damage by crushing the target with gravitational force.

Heaven Slaughter.name: Heaven Slaughter
Heaven Slaughter.description:
Shuts their eyes then casually swings their sword
 **The Air Splits**

Mystic Palm Enhanced.name: Mystic Palm Enhanced
Mystic Palm Enhanced.obtainment: obtained from sakura at jounin mentor rank
Mystic Palm Enhanced.description: Enhanced version of the jutsu Mystic Palm
Mystic Palm Enhanced.info: User heals based on their missing health, but this time it's more healing than before.

Corrupted Needle Assault.name: Corrupted Needle Assault
Corrupted Needle Assault.description: Launches a barrage of cursed senbon needles that causes heavy bleeding
Corrupted Needle Assault.info: Corrupted Haku launches cursed senbon needles at the opponent inflicting heavy bleed and dealing more damage.

Corrupted Ice Prison.name: Corrupted Ice Prison
Corrupted Ice Prison.description: Traps the enemy in a cursed ice prison, stunning and draining chakra
Corrupted Ice Prison.info: Corrupted Haku traps the opponent in a cursed ice prison, stunning them and draining chakra.

1.description: A dense fog swirls, shapes shifting within, slowly revealing user's silhouette.

2.description: The silhouette sharpens, crimson tendrils faintly visible as the figure solidifies.

3.description: user slowly turns their head toward target with an empty gaze.

4.description: user's pupils glow faintly red, a subtle but ominous sign.

5.description: user lets out a quiet, unsettling giggle.

6.description: Suddenly, user sprints toward target, closing the distance rapidly.

7.description: user strikes target with a blood-infused sword slash, creating a small blood puddle at their feet.

57.description: Imploding sphere shatters inward, launching blood spears piercing the target.

58.description: Bloodleeches split from the imbedded spears, wrapping the target in leeches.

61.description: The bloodsea slowly sinks into the ground, leaving behind a scarlet stain that pulses faintly before fading.

8-16.description: user continues precise blood sword slashes, the blood puddle thickening into a swirling bloodpool.

17-25.description: Bloodpool grows, siphoning lifeforce as user's slashes grow relentless.

26-30.description: Blood tendrils crawl along user's back, initiating blood armor formation.

31-35.description: Blood armor solidifies, blood sword pulses with growing power.

36-40.description: Blood wings sprout from user's back, granting flight and dodge.

41-45.description: Full Bloodsea armaments active on the user.

46-50.description: Bloodsphere forms around the target, imprisoning and stunning them.

51-55.description: Bloodsphere pulses, draining chakra and health from the target.

59-60.description: Leech prison drains then restores the target.

1.description:
user calls for the rebellion.
 Gojo uses domain expansion on target cornering them with the rebellion.

3.description: Jinwoo holds the target in place with his shadow soldiers.

4-5.description: Goku Finishes target with a Kamehameha.

Puppet Master.name: Puppet Master
Puppet Master.description: Controls a puppet to attack target

Dynamic Entry.name: Dynamic Entry
Dynamic Entry.description: user leaps into the air and crashes down on target

Thirty Two Palms.name: Thirty Two Palms
Thirty Two Palms.description: user Strikes target 32 times in rapid succession

Sixty Four Palms.name: Sixty Four Palms
Sixty Four Palms.description: user Strikes target 64 times in rapid succession

Wind Scythe.name: Wind Scythe
Wind Scythe.description: Unleashes a blade of wind at target

Monster Claw.name: Monster Claw
Monster Claw.description: Transforms his hand into a claw and unleashes a powerful claw attack

Samehada Slash.name: Samehada Slash
Samehada Slash.description: Unleashes a powerful slash with the Samehada sword.

One Thousand Slashes.name: One Thousand Slashes
One Thousand Slashes.description: Unleashes a flurry of slashes at the target.

Amaterasu.name: Amaterasu
Amaterasu.description: Summons black flames that burn anything in their path.

Summon Manda.name: Summon Manda
Summon Manda.description: Summons the giant snake Manda to crush the enemy.

Kamehameha.name: Kamehameha
Kamehameha.description: Unleashes a powerful energy wave at the enemy.

Crimson Lightning Dragon.name: Crimson Lightning Dragon
Crimson Lightning Dragon.description:
***BEGONE***
 user summons a massive dragon of lightning that strikes target and stuns them

Azora Raizen.name: Azora Raizen
Azora Raizen.description:
***ùï¨ùñüùñîùñóùñÜ ùïΩùñÜùñéùñüùñäùñì***
 Come Forth .. And Prepare To Meet Your DEMISEEE!!

Get Flexed on.name: Get Flexed on
Get Flexed on.description:
Get Flexed on Kiddo
 user flexes so hard they deal emotional damage to target

Heavenly Palm of Annihilation.name: Heavenly Palm of Annihilation
Heavenly Palm of Annihilation.description:
***HEAVENLY PALM OF ANNIHILATION***
 user unleashes a devastating palm strike

Carnage.name: Carnage
Carnage.description: user goes berserk, increasing power and defense.

Explosive Paper Clone.description: tags target with an explosive tag

Kirin: Lightning Storm.name: Kirin: Lightning Storm
Kirin: Lightning Storm.description: User summons a lightning storm that deals massive damage to target

9th form: Rengoku.name: 9th form: Rengoku
9th form: Rengoku.description:
**Fire Breathing 9th Form: Rengoku**
 cuts through target

Guillotine Drop.name: Guillotine Drop
Guillotine Drop.description:
**user leaps high into the air and slams down target breaking their defense.**
 deals damage

Shadow Clone Jutsu: 1000 clones.name: Shadow Clone Jutsu: 1000 clones
Shadow Clone Jutsu: 1000 clones.description:
user creates 1000 clones of themself to confuse and attack target
 clones attack

Lightning Hound.name: Lightning Hound
Lightning Hound.description: Summons a giant hound made of lightning to attack target

Black Flash: Deaths Awakened Itself.name: Black Flash: Deaths Awakened Itself
Black Flash: Deaths Awakened Itself.description:
***BLACK, FLASH!***
 user attacks and unleashes a devastating upward strike into the opponent's gut, piercing their heart with overwhelming force

Human Boulder.name: Human Boulder
Human Boulder.description: ***user transforms into a massive boulder and rolls over target

Puppet Kazekage.description:
user summons a puppet to attack target.
 the puppet stays with user until they die and keeps attacking

1.description: User summons a puppet to attack target.

2-99.description: The puppet attacks target dealing damage.

Demonic Illusion.name: Demonic Illusion
Demonic Illusion.description: user traps target in a powerful genjutsu, stunning and confusing them

Tenseigan Chakra Mode.name: Tenseigan Chakra Mode
Tenseigan Chakra Mode.description: user enters tenseigan chakra mode, greatly increasing power, defense for a short duration

1.description: User enters tenseigan chakra mode, greatly increasing power and defense.

6.description: User exits tenseigan chakra mode, returning to normal state.

Otsutsuki's Wrath.name: Otsutsuki's Wrath
Otsutsuki's Wrath.description: user unleashes a devastating attack, dealing massive damage to target

Truth-Seeking Orbs.name: Truth-Seeking Orbs
Truth-Seeking Orbs.description: user creates orbs of truth that seek out the target and deal damage

Blades of Judgement.name: Blades of Judgement
Blades of Judgement.description: user uses the energy from their halo to fire a barrage of energy blades at target that explode on impact

Set Your Face Ablaze.name: Set Your Face Ablaze
Set Your Face Ablaze.description:
**No Matter How Devastated You May Be!**
 user hands ignite in flames, greatly increasing power and attacking target consecutively 3 times

Heaven's Supremacy.name: Heaven's Supremacy
Heaven's Supremacy.description: **I'll take over you human and SHOW THESE INSECTS THE POWER OF THE GODS**

Kaioken.name: Kaioken
Kaioken.description:
**Fortyfold power‚Ä¶ let‚Äôs push beyond the limits!**
 user‚Äôs body ignites in a blazing crimson aura, their power surging beyond comprehension. The ground trembles as energy erupts outward, pushing their strength, speed, and spirit past mortal limits.

Reversal : Nil.name: Reversal : Nil
Reversal : Nil.description: The jutsu harnesses target's life force and energy, channeling it back to empower user‚Äôs very being. As the stolen power courses through their blood, user rises, fueled by the foe‚Äôs own vitality

A Twins Sacrifice.name: A Twins Sacrifice
A Twins Sacrifice.description:
**In a cursed world, power is only gained from loss.**
 user's twin sacrifices himself, unlocking user's full potential and sending them on a rampage

Demonic Transformation.name: Demonic Transformation
Demonic Transformation.description: Mark awakened...Transparent World opened...and behold my true form,**now you will die**...

Super Saiyan.name: Super Saiyan
Super Saiyan.description: Light detonates around me as my power tears the heavens open, a single, blinding strike that ends the fight. I will shred any hand that reaches to undo my world ‚Äî not today, not ever.. because , **I WILL NEVER LET YOU DESTROY MY WORLD.**

Authentic Mutual Love.name: Authentic Mutual Love
Authentic Mutual Love.description: **Domain Expansion**‚Ä¶ Yuta grips the hilt of his sword, cursed energy surging through the blade as he draws it. The air distorts ‚Äî a random technique takes form, its nature unknown until the strike lands.

Limit Ultra Kamehameha.name: Limit Ultra Kamehameha
Limit Ultra Kamehameha.description:
**This is the end! FULL FORCE KAMEHAMEHA!**
 user gathers a vast amount of ki between their palms, the air trembling under divine pressure, then firing it at target

Fire Style: Nuclear Armageddon.name: Fire Style: Nuclear Armageddon
Fire Style: Nuclear Armageddon.description:
**I don't knock...because freedom RINGS**
 decimates target

Punisher Shield.name: Punisher Shield
Punisher Shield.description:
**It's Futile!**
  user calmly swipes their hand through the air, forming a blazing sphere of divine ki. The barrier shimmers, reflecting incoming energy before they follow up with a sharp spin kick

Izanagi.name: Izanagi
Izanagi.description: *You fight within a reality of my creation! As my true form solidifies and ascends past all limitations, your perceived advantages shatter and return to the void from which they came!*

Meteoric Burst.name: Meteoric Burst
Meteoric Burst.description: user unleashes their ultimate transformation, Meteoric Burst. Their body radiates with blinding energy as power erupts from within, splitting the ground beneath them. With blitz speed, the user charges forward and delivers a cataclysmic punch that obliterates everything in their path

Eight Gates.name: Eight Gates
Eight Gates.description: Opens one of the Eight Gates, boosting power at the cost of health.
Eight Gates.info: Each use opens a new gate, up to the 7th gate. Each gate costs 20% of the user's max health.

Web Trap.name: Web Trap
Web Trap.description: Traps the target in a web.
Web Trap.info: A basic web trap that may stun the opponent.

Water Clone.name: Water Clone
Water Clone.description: Creates a water clone to attack.

Rock Throw.name: Rock Throw
Rock Throw.description: Throws a rock at the target.

Ice Mirrors.name: Ice Mirrors
Ice Mirrors.description: Creates mirrors of ice to attack from.

Tsukuyomi.name: Tsukuyomi
Tsukuyomi.info: A powerful genjutsu that can stun the opponent.

Tank x1000.name: Tank x1000
Tank x1000.info: A jutsu that greatly boosts the user's defense.

Demon Cloak.name: Demon Cloak
Demon Cloak.description: Transforms the user into a demon form.
Demon Cloak.info: A jutsu that transforms the user, boosting power and defense.

Seventh Form: Haze Dance.name: Seventh Form: Haze Dance
Seventh Form: Haze Dance.description:
**Mist Breathing: Haze Dance!!**
user envelops themselves in a nearly invisible mist that obscures their presence. In an instant, they move with blinding speed, delivering a flurry of precise, slashing strikes from multiple directions. The enemy struggles to predict or block the attacks, as each strike appears to come from thin air

Crystal Palace.name: Crystal Palace
Crystal Palace.description:
**Crystal Palace**
user creates a massive palace of ice crystals that crashes down on the enemy with devastating force. The crystalline structure ignores armor, piercing through defenses
Crystal Palace.info: Ultimate ice jutsu with armor penetration

Ice Prison.name: Ice Prison
Ice Prison.description: user traps target in a prison of Ice. Stunning and dealing damage to them

Blizzard Strike.name: Blizzard Strike
Blizzard Strike.description: user creates a blizzard that damage target and has a chance to frost them

Seventh Form: Flaming Thunder God.name: Seventh Form: Flaming Thunder God
Seventh Form: Flaming Thunder God.description:
**Thunder Breathing, Seventh form: Flaming Thunder God**
   user becomes wreathed in blazing crimson lightning and divine flame. Their speed multiplies to the point their body leaves fiery afterimages, and every strike hits with the force of a thunderstorm. The sword erupts with burning lightning, searing and shocking anything it touches

Twin Rising Dragons.name: Twin Rising Dragons
Twin Rising Dragons.description: user soars into the air and barrages the enemy several ninja tools
Twin Rising Dragons.info: user soars into the air and barrages the enemy several ninja tools

Primary Lotus.name: Primary Lotus
Primary Lotus.description: user kicks their target into the air, using their momentum to take their back and spiral them back to the ground
Primary Lotus.info: user kicks their target into the air, using their momentum to take their back and spiral them back to the ground

Planetary Devastation.name: Planetary Devastation
Planetary Devastation.description: user traps target in a black sphere. It detonates in 10 rounds!

1.description: The black Sphere starts to form.

2-9.description: The black Sphere continues to form.

10.description: The black Sphere traps target and kills them!

Wheel of Fate Adaptation.name: Wheel of Fate Adaptation
Wheel of Fate Adaptation.description: Eight-Handled Sword Divergent Sila Divine General: Adaptation. A divine wheel manifests behind the user, spinning as they adapt to every attack.

Rebirth Protocol.name: Rebirth Protocol
Rebirth Protocol.description:
**Surprised? It‚Äôs the genius of the Big Gete Star**
 The user‚Äôs damaged body liquefies into living metal, instantly reconstructing itself with flawless precision ‚Äî as if the attack never landed.

King of Hell.name: King of Hell
King of Hell.description:
**I'LL BECOME THE KING OF HELL!**
  user coats all three blades in powerful Armament Haki and Conqueror Haki. A colossal dragon-shaped aura coils around them as they charge forward, unleashing a devastating three-sword strike that tears through the battlefield in a single, decisive motion, leaving behind crushing pressure and carved terrain

Black Vortex Cataclysm.name: Black Vortex Cataclysm
Black Vortex Cataclysm.description:
Darkness swallows everything...even your hope!
 user spreads an abyss of crushing darkness across the battlefield as gravity twists violently inward. Shadows collapse toward a single point, dragging enemies off balance before the user surges forward, unleashing a devastating quake-charged strike that shatters the ground and space around the target

Ruri'iro Kujaku.name: Ruri'iro Kujaku
Ruri'iro Kujaku.description:
Split and Deviate
 user  unlocks the next level, releasing their shikai and stealing their opponents health

200% Hollow Purple.name: 200% Hollow Purple
200% Hollow Purple.description:
**200% Hollow Purple**
 user amplifies the power of this singular attack by 200% and devastates the entire city

Hakai Release.name: Hakai Release
Hakai Release.description: user calls upon their godly energy, releasing a ball of mass destruction towards their opponent that erases anything it came into contact with

Dragon Emperor Life Destructor.name: Dragon Emperor Life Destructor
Dragon Emperor Life Destructor.description:
**THERE SHALL AND ONLY BE ONE AND ONLY ONE BE ONE SUPREME BEY AND THAT IS THIS LDRAGO DESTRUCTOR ALONE **
user Launches his Ultimate bey which fights beside him and  Uses his Ultimate bey move where Ldrago is a massacre given form. The moment it activates, the air shatters and life is wrenched out of the enemy by force, muscles tearing, bones screaming under pressure that feels like existence itself is being crushed. Blood boils, senses rupture, and the victim‚Äôs body betrays them as their own vitality is ripped apart cell by cell. What remains is not defeat, but ruin‚Äîan enemy left broken, hollow, and fully aware that L‚ÄôDragos did not just end the fight‚Ä¶ it erased them

Four Violet Flames Formation.name: Four Violet Flames Formation
Four Violet Flames Formation.description: user  produces a large barrier around themself, protecting them from attacks and causing the enemy to become dazed from the blinding purple lights of the barrier, stumbling the target. Once inside the barrier, user will gain a massive boost to defense

Summon Shrek.name: Summon Shrek
Summon Shrek.description: user has summoned shrek, who beats the enemy out of their swamp

Unified Will.name: Unified Will
Unified Will.description:
**My swords‚Ä¶ my will‚Ä¶ my Haki. All of it becomes one!**
 Just by standing on the battlefield, the user dominates it every strike hits harder, every blow taken feels lighter, and enemies with weaker resolve crumble before the user‚Äôs presence

Full Counter.name: Full Counter
Full Counter.description:
Now then, Eat up your own shi-
 user Reflects back the attacks aimed at him bypassing all defences and absorbing some of the power and dealing the damage

World Cutting Slash.name: World Cutting Slash
World Cutting Slash.description:
Scales of Dragon. Repulsion. Twin Meteors.
 user compresses chakra energy into a slash that ignores conventional distance and form. With a single motion, the slash tears through space itself, carving a fracture across the battlefield

PIERCING BLOOD: CONVERGENCE MAXIMUM.name: PIERCING BLOOD: CONVERGENCE MAXIMUM
PIERCING BLOOD: CONVERGENCE MAXIMUM.description:
When you get to the other side, be sure to ask for my brothers forgiveness
 user compresses blood between their hands, creating a high pressure beam and heating it up to extreme temperatures as it‚Äôs released. While pressuring the opponent with the piercing blood, user also creates convergence orbs that explode in proximity to the opponent

1.description: user compresses blood, releasing a high pressure piercing beam that poisons the target!

2-3.description: Convergence orbs float around the target, exploding when close

FLOWING RED SCALE.name: FLOWING RED SCALE
FLOWING RED SCALE.description:
I mist walk ahead of my little brothers. That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm strong.
 user  manipulates the blood within their own body, increasing their stats and creating a hardened blood armor to protect themselves

Pee Pee Poo Poo.name: Pee Pee Poo Poo
Pee Pee Poo Poo.description: user does a pee pee poo poo

Perfect Sage.name: Perfect Sage
Perfect Sage.description: user absorbs chakra nature, enhancing their stats and improving their combat skills

Gold Experience Requiem.name: Gold Experience Requiem
Gold Experience Requiem.description:
You will never arrive at the truth that will occur! None who stand before me shall ever do so, no matter what abilities they may wield!
user Takes the  Ultimate Stand and summons a humanoid golden entity that embodies absolute control over every effect and granting the user  life after death

Violent Fierce God Slicer.name: Violent Fierce God Slicer
Violent Fierce God Slicer.description:
…™Íú∞  è·¥è·¥ú Íú∞·¥á·¥á ü …¥·¥è·¥õ ú…™…¥…¢ Íú∞ Ä·¥è·¥ç ·¥õ ú…™Íú± ·¥Ä·¥õ·¥õ·¥Ä·¥Ñ·¥ã ..... ·¥õ ú·¥á…¥  è·¥è·¥ú Ä ·¥Ä ü Ä·¥á·¥Ä·¥Ö è ·¥Ö·¥á·¥Ä·¥Ö
 user Concentrates his Super Saiyan Ro≈õe aura converting his anger into power around his hand forming a pink and black scythe which cuts through dimensions and damaging the target

Explosive Bird.name: Explosive Bird
Explosive Bird.description: user creates a bird made of explosive chakra and sends it towards target

C3.name: C3
C3.description: user drops a life sized nuke onto target

Izanami.name: Izanami
Izanami.description:
**Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return**
 user uses Izanami, The Space and Time around them slowed down. user now controls the time around them for the fate to be decided.
Izanami.info: On use: Sets HP/Chakra to Infinity for 3 rounds (Recording Phase). After Recording, Flow Phase starts where target MUST repeat moves or deal 0 damage, while user auto-repeats moves. Only usable once. Last Resort: If dying without using, revives at 1 HP, cleanses, and activates Life Drainer mode.

Life Drainer.name: Life Drainer
Life Drainer.description: User drains the very life essence of the target.
Life Drainer.info: Attack: user.power * 2500 / target.defense. Steals 50% Max HP from target.
